name: Playroom Racer 3
description:
Small cars, big fun! Playroom Racer 3 is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.

Do you prefer a fast sports car or a big concrete mixer truck? Select your favourite vehicle and smash your opponents.

You can also turn your device into a controller and join a local multiplayer championship played on your Apple TV.

Features:
- 4 beautiful scenes to explore
- 8 different vehicles
- Local multiplayer mode for up to 4 players (requires an Apple TV 4th gen.)
- Stunning 3D graphics powered by Metal on compatible devices
- Realistic physics simulation
- Easy to learn controls
- Game Center leaderboards
- No ads
- No In-App Purchases
